metadata.Title: CVE-2017-14629 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In sam2p 0.49.3, the in_xpm_reader function in in_xpm.cpp has an integer signedness error, leading to a crash when writing to an out-of-bounds array element. It was discovered that Sam2p incorrectly handled certain image files. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service or other unspecified impact.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-14629` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

sam2p - 0.49.2-3+deb8u3build0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sam2p package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.49.2-3+deb8u3build0.16.04.1').
